content: > espace tricot is a yarn store in montreal canada discover our yarns here 1 our sunday morning dk yarn is a deliciously rustic yet soft blend of bluefaced leicester and masham fibres spun and dyed in england the unique blend of naturally brown and off-white fibres creates a heathered effect which brings depth and dimension as a nod to the coziness and slower pace of sunday mornings our sunday morning shawl is a relaxing lightly textured design worked in alternate sections of stockinette and twisted rib a row of sweet bobbles before the twisted rib border adds a little drama and whimsy a lovely uncomplicated project for those moments when you simply want to immerse yourself in the meditative peace of the stitches sample shown in the colourway offline 1 http //www espacetricot com
